welcome_message_body: Welcome to Boulder, where the stunning natural beauty of the Rocky Mountains meets the charming and vibrant city culture. Get ready to explore the endless outdoor adventures, world-class dining, and unique local shops that make Boulder a truly special place to visit. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Shamane's Bake Shoppe
restaurants.description: Shamane's Bake Shoppe is a bakery located in Boulder.

restaurants.name: Walnut Cafe
restaurants.description: Walnut Cafe is a café located in Boulder.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Erie Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Erie Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Jeffco Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport, catering to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
